issue.title: Collision visualization broken after removing an object from the scene

content.raw:
I think I have isolated the [commit](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/fdaeaff) that is causing the problem. 

When the second sphere is inserted (after deleting the first one), the collision visual message is published in Collision::Load(). However, this message is not received in Scene::ProcessVisualMsg(). 

I've been looking at the source of the problem with @iche033 but we haven't figured it out why this is happening. @nkoenig , do you have any suggestion?
content.html:
I think I have isolated the commit that is causing the problem.

When the second sphere is inserted (after deleting the first one), the collision visual message is published in Collision::Load(). However, this message is not received in Scene::ProcessVisualMsg().

I've been looking at the source of the problem with @iche033 but we haven't figured it out why this is happening. @nkoenig , do you have any suggestion?
